Inzola nods to Wrath and waits for Wrath to lead the way. Deemos looked at =
Wrath.

"You know, I used to hunt animals, but I had so many animal heads o=
n my wall, I started hunting robots. Caught my fair share of Maximals and P=
redacons, I did! But the ones here are extra powerful, good challenge!" Dee=
mos said to Wrath...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizard=
s 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 10:50 PM
  Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Wrath: Hmm...Sound good to me! *Wrath says to In=
zola*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 9:05 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Be=
ast Wars


    Deemos just stares at him.

    "Wrath, we could go and find=
 someone to slag." Inzola said...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
 From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday,=
 July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Wrath: I d=
on't really know......Damn... I never plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't been aoun=
d for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continues thinking of something to do*
      =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
        Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrat=
h.

        "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
          Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
       =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
  =
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            "Yes, let's go." Inzola=
 said to Wrath...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
 From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
 Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


              Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
     =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
   =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, July 2=
2, 2000 4:39 AM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
   "It's up to you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
               =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
 =
                 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, =
July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


     =
             *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where should start? *Wrath asks=
 Inzola and Deemos*
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
               From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
                  =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    "Hunting? We hunted dow=
n almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

           =
         "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said. He patte=
d Wrath on the shoulder.

                    "Those Alliance and Preds wil=
l be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.=


                    "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a =
few stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
         =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: ilov=
ealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                =
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                      Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......=
We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *W=
rath asks Deemos and Inzola*
                        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
                        To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2=
:13 AM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              =
          Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

                        "=
Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said.=
 Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath=
.

                        "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deem=
os asked Wrath...
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
                         From: ilovealllizards 
                          T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2=
000 12:53 AM
                          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      =
                    Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemo=
s spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand s=
hake*
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
                 From: THECODE 
                            To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM=

                            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                    =
        Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and=
 looked around.

                            "Maximal base, it's crude but =
it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

                            "Who a=
re you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

                            Gangon's spark is=
 still waiting.

                            Artist runs around in a circle=
, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs away from the=
 Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain and an avalanche=
 starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his mind. Hours l=
ater, he awakes.

                            "Oh, that was some blow, but =
I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                            "Plintiss=
a? Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He =
remembered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were worki=
ng, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

           =
                 "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was n=
ear." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms=
. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

                        =
    "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed =
him.

                            "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good t=
ime! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a g=
rassy plain.

                            Dracona held up her scanning devi=
ce in front of Scorponok's face.

                            "I can find t=
hat device I lost." Dracona said.

                            "Then I'll g=
ive it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dra=
cona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Si=
nesis stared at her, mouths agape.

                            The Radicon=
s sat there still...

-----------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------
